sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { AppInput } from '../components/UI/appInput' import { Indicator } from '../components/UI/indicator' import { Heading } from '../components/typography/heading' import { AppButton } from '../components/UI/AppButton' const StepOne = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [answer, setAnswer] = useState(null) const isButtonDisabled = !answer const handleAnswerInput = (e) => { setAnswer(e.target.value) } return (
navigate('/step-two')} text='Далее' />
) } export default StepOne
